List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual SkImageDecoder * newDecoder (SkStream *)=0

Detailed Description

Calling newDecoder with a stream returns a new matching imagedecoder instance, or NULL if none can be found. The caller must manage its ownership of the stream as usual, calling unref() when it is done, as the returned decoder may have called ref() (and if so, the decoder is responsible for balancing its ownership when it is destroyed).
